application.name: lrowac2isis
application.brief: Import LRO WAC EDR images into Isis cube format

parameter.name: FROM
parameter.brief: Input PDS formatted LRO WAC EDR image file.
parameter.description: Use this parameter to select the LRO WAC EDR image filename.

parameter.name: EVEN
parameter.description: Use this parameter to select the output filename. The output file will contain the even framelets from the original PDS formatted file.

parameter.name: ODD
parameter.description: Use this parameter to select the output filename. The output file will contain the odd framelets from the original PDS formatted file.
